trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to control access to a cryptographic key object without direct manipulation of an Access Control List (ACL).
trans-unit.target: 能够控制对而无需直接操作的访问控制列表 (ACL) 的加密密钥对象的访问。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> class by using the specified security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>通过使用指定的安全描述符的类。

trans-unit.source: The security descriptor from which to create the new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 从中创建新的安全描述符<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the securable object associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Type>与此关联的安全对象<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The type of the securable object associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 与此关联的安全对象类型<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref>用指定的值的类。

trans-unit.source: The identity to which the access rule applies.
trans-unit.target: 访问规则应用到其中的标识。

trans-unit.source: It must be an object that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 它必须是可强制转换为一个对象<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The access mask of this rule.
trans-unit.target: 此规则的访问掩码。

trans-unit.source: The access mask is a 32-bit collection of anonymous bits, the meaning of which is defined by the individual integrators.
trans-unit.target: 访问掩码是 32 位集合的匿名位，其含义由单个集成者定义。

trans-unit.source: true if this rule is inherited from a parent container.
trans-unit.target: 如果继承自父容器，此规则为 true。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the inheritance properties of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 指定访问规则的继承属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether inherited access rules are automatically propagated.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否自动传播继承的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: The propagation flags are ignored if `inheritanceFlags` is set to <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果，则忽略传播标志`inheritanceFlags`设置为<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the valid access control type.
trans-unit.target: 指定有效的访问控制类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"></xref> object that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule"> </xref>此方法创建的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the object associated with the access rules of this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Type>与此访问规则关联的对象<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> object must be an object that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>对象必须是可强制转换为一个对象<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The type of the object associated with the access rules of this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 与此访问规则关联的对象的类型<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified access rule to the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将添加指定的访问规则到自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 与此关联<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Adding an access rule might cause existing access rules in the DACL to be merged.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个访问规则可能会导致 DACL 要合并现有的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified audit rule to the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 的指定的审核规则关联与此<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Adding an audit rule might cause existing access rules in the SACL to be merged.
trans-unit.target: 添加的审核规则可能会导致 SACL 要合并现有的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的审核规则。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"></xref> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"></xref>用指定的值的类。

trans-unit.source: The identity to which the audit rule applies.
trans-unit.target: 审计规则应用到其中的标识。

trans-unit.source: It must be an object that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 它必须是可强制转换为一个对象<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The access mask of this rule.
trans-unit.target: 此规则的访问掩码。

trans-unit.source: The access mask is a 32-bit collection of anonymous bits, the meaning of which is defined by the individual integrators.
trans-unit.target: 访问掩码是 32 位集合的匿名位，其含义由单个集成者定义。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this rule is inherited from a parent container.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此规则继承自父容器中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the inheritance properties of the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 指定审核规则的继承属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether inherited audit rules are automatically propagated.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否自动传播继承的审核规则。

trans-unit.source: The propagation flags are ignored if `inheritanceFlags` is set to <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果，则忽略传播标志`inheritanceFlags`设置为<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the conditions for which the rule is audited.
trans-unit.target: 指定为其审核规则的条件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"></xref> object that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule"> </xref>此方法创建的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> object associated with the audit rules of this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Type>对象与此的审核规则关联<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> object must be an object that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>对象必须是可强制转换为一个对象<xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The type of the object associated with the audit rules of this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 与此的审核规则关联的对象的类型<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Removes access rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 删除包含相同的安全标识符和访问掩码，因为指定的访问规则从自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 与此关联的访问规则<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Access removal is accomplished by using a complex algorithm that might add access control rules in addition to removing them.
trans-unit.target: 访问删除通过使用复杂的算法可能添加访问控制规则以及删除它们。

trans-unit.source: This method fails to remove the access rule and returns `false` if the inheritance rules associated with the access rule are too complex for the removal algorithm to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法无法删除的访问规则，并返回`false`如果与访问规则关联的继承规则而言过于复杂，要成功的删除算法。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the access rule was successfully removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果访问规则已成功删除;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that have the same security identifier as the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 删除具有相同的安全标识符，因为指定的访问规则从自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 与此关联的所有访问规则<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that exactly match the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 移除与指定的访问规则从自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 与此关联完全匹配的所有访问规则<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: Removes audit rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 删除包含相同的安全标识符和访问掩码，因为指定的审核规则从系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 与此相关的审核规则<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Audit removal is accomplished by using a complex algorithm that might add audit control rules in addition to removing them.
trans-unit.target: 审核删除通过使用复杂的算法可能会添加审核控制规则以及删除它们。

trans-unit.source: This method fails to remove the audit rule and returns `false` if the inheritance rules associated with the audit rule are too complex for the removal algorithm to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法无法删除审核规则，并返回`false`如果与审核规则关联的继承规则而言过于复杂，要成功的删除算法。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的审核规则。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the audit rule was successfully removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功删除的审核规则;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that have the same security identifier as the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 删除具有相同的安全标识符，因为指定的审核规则从系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 与此关联的所有审核规则<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的审核规则。

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that exactly match the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 移除与指定的审核规则从系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 与此关联完全匹配的所有审核规则<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的审核规则。

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules in the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object and then adds the specified access rule.
trans-unit.target: 移除中自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 与此关联的所有访问规则<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象，然后将添加指定的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to reset.
trans-unit.target: 要重置的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: Removes all access rules that contain the same security identifier and qualifier as the specified access rule in the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object and then adds the specified access rule.
trans-unit.target: 移除包含相同的安全标识符和限定符，因为指定的访问规则中自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 与此关联的所有访问规则<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象，然后将添加指定的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: The access rule to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: Removes all audit rules that contain the same security identifier and qualifier as the specified audit rule in the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref> object and then adds the specified audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 删除包含相同的安全标识符和限定符，因为指定的审核规则系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 中与此关联的所有审核规则<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.CryptoKeySecurity"></xref>对象，然后将添加指定的审核规则。

trans-unit.source: The audit rule to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的审核规则。
